actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1576.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #834 (368-38).
Measure laid on table in House, S. 3036 passed in lieu.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Coinage Act of 1965 to change the size, weight, and design of the one-dollar coin, and for other purposes.
short_title: Susan B. Anthony Dollar Coin Act

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1576) Susan B. Anthony Dollar Coin Act - Amends the Coinage Act of 1965 to change the size and weight of the one-dollar coin and to require that the obverse side of such coin bear the likeness of Susan B. Anthony, and the reverse side bear the design of the symbolic eagle of Apollo 11 landing on the moon.

titles.title: Susan B. Anthony Dollar Coin Act
A bill to amend the Coinage Act of 1965 to change the size, weight, and design of the one-dollar coin, and for other purposes.
